channel.title: SRCC Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "SRCC Village"

item.title: Re: SRCC Village
item.content:encoded: Update: We are now summoning many kaiju to the village, currently we are enticing about 2-3 kaiju per week so if anyone needs a kaiju drop you can try your luck in the village. We also have the essential upgrades(Epic Monument, Jonin council, Burgerninja and Tools of the Trade) and they are open to anyone who needs them.

item.title: Re: SRCC Village
item.content:encoded:
The village has expanded much, however we are in need of more members.
So far it is looking like the IM will be happening by April, I am just needing one of the spirits then I will begin S4 and work on the IM requirements.

If you want to join, the village name is SRCC. All applications are accepted :)

item.title: SRCC Village
item.content:encoded: We need more members, we have 20 now but we need more to further expand. We have mostly member upgrades, I like to focus on helping the members more than the village currently. We have a party house, Jonin council, and a war room. Our next upgrade is the potion palace :) If you want to join, then feel free to send an application :)
